subject: Why don't you buy some medications to be healthy
body:
Dear customer.
Wanna know how to save much on your medications without having to risk your health? CanadianPharmacy's gonna give you a little hint on it in this letter.
Our Canadian online pharmacy is happy to offer USA citizens to resort to the services of our e-shop located at CanadianPharmacy. We are the only Canadian Web pharmacy regularly monitored by FDA. CanadianPharmacy all the generic drugs that you might need for less.
CanadianPharmacy your #1 source for cheap generic drugs from Canada.
Yours,Jolene Rivas
